title: Bug 116786: Library include should store relative path.
description: When including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer should generate and save the relative path.
OB: Currently, when including a library in a report design, the BIRT designer is not saving the relative path. Instead, it is storing the absolute path of the library.
EB: The BIRT designer should store the relative path of the included library.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open a report design in the BIRT designer. 
2. Include a library from a different location, using a relative path. 
3. Save the report design. 
4. Close the BIRT designer. 
5. Reopen the report design and verify that the included library still has the relative path.
